text: Renmen zhong youren shuo:“Women xinyang an lale.” Dan jiaru ta wei an la zhidao er shou shanghai, ta jiu ba renmen de shanghai dang zuo an la de xingfa. Jiaru shengli cong ni de zhu jianglin, tamen [wei xinzhe] bi shuo:“Women que shi tong nimen zai yiqi de.” Nandao an la bushi zui zhidao ren lei xiongzhong de yiqie ma?
